member.name: M:Moth.Tasks.TaskQueue.TryRunNextTask(Moth.Tasks.IProfiler)
member.summary: Tries to run the next task in the queue, if present. May also perform profiling on the task through an .
member.param: to profile the run-time of the task.
member.returns: if a task was run, if the is empty.
member.remarks: Please note that the return value does not indicate if a task was successful. The method will return if a task was ready in the queue, regardless of whether an exception occured.

to profile the run-time of the task.

member.name: M:Moth.Tasks.TaskQueue.Clear(System.Action{System.Exception})
member.summary: Removes all pending tasks from the queue. Also calls on tasks which implement the method.
member.param: Method for handling an exception thrown by a task's .
member.remarks: As the method iterates through all tasks in the queue and calls on tasks, it can hang for an unknown amount of time. If an exception is thrown in an call, the method continues on with disposing the remaining tasks.
